remarks: Value of division: the (unique) element ` x ` such that ` ( B x. x ) = A ` .  This is meaningful only when ` B ` is nonzero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2016.)
statement:
xdivval $p |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR /\ B =/= 0 ) -> ( A /e B ) = ( iota_ x e. RR* ( B *e x ) = A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
